malliye uba meka kiyonawanam me tika hithataganin mulinma puruduweyan minissunta wayasa balala kathakaranna, uba thama iskole yana ekek kiyala loketa hanganna epa iskole yanawa kiyanne lajja wenna deyak nemene.anika blog awakashe ube appage budale kiyala hithan methana raganna lasthi wenna epa ubalata wada wayasa minissu meke innawa ubalata wada sahena kal idala meke idapu athithaya danna minissu ubala wage meke raganne na, un unge paduwe liyana deyak liyagena kamentuwak kotagena innawa.ubath eka para buduwenna yanne nathuwa himihita hoda thanakata enna uthsaha karapan.ara deshakayata sanwadekata enna kiyala uuwa pachchal karanna haduwa wage gon wada karanna epa.anthimata ubawamayi chatar wenne.anika ikmanin wayasata yanna kiyala hithanna epa ikmanin wayasata giya kiyanne ikmanin marayata lanwenawa kiyana eka.api dan jiwitha kalayen bagayak withara gewala iwara karapu minissu, ee unata api thamath aasayi punchi kaleta yanna.ane manda ubala mokata me hithin wayasata yanna hadanawada kiyala.punchi kale punchi widihata idapan tharuna kale tharuna widihata idapan.hithin naki wennawath samajayata thaman hena parinathayi kiyalawath pennanna epa.mage deshane iwarayi danwath hadiyan puluwannam.anthima washayen mathaka thiyaganin methana raganna hadanna epa meka ube appage budale neme meka api hamotama ayithi deyak, uba raganda eddi ahaka inna apitath poddak awissena gathiyak enawa.
